thread.title: 5 Right-Wing Idiocies this Week: O'Reilly's Dangerous Gun Violence Delusion
thread.title_full: 5 Right-Wing Idiocies this Week: O'Reilly's Dangerous Gun Violence Delusion

author: LongWinded
title: 5 Right-Wing Idiocies this Week: O'Reilly's Dangerous Gun Violence Delusion
text: 5 Right-Wing Idiocies this Week: O'Reilly's Dangerous Gun Violence Delusion | Alternet Quote: The week began with an attempted massacre of Planned Parenthood in Congress and ended with another horrific mass shooting in Oregon. Conservatives grilled the head of the organization that provides healthcare to poor women as if she were a criminal, and then threw up their hands saying nothing can be done about gun violence. Poor healthcare and random gun deaths are just the price you pay for freedom, they say. Or as Jeb Bush so brilliantly articulated: "Stuff happens." Here are five low-lights from the week that was: 1. Bill OReilly: We cant do anything about gun violence. I really can't think of a single thing. Supporting a MIC corporation. Why is no one surprised that life matters so little to the right?
